com.henrikhedberg.util

Interface BufferOutputStream.Handler

  • Enclosing class:
    BufferOutputStream

    public static interface BufferOutputStream.Handler
    A handler that is called when the specified BufferOutputStream has buffered new bytes or has been asked to close itself.
    Version:
    1.0 (20150503)
    Author:
    Henrik Hedberg <henrik.hedberg@iki.fi>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleClose(BufferOutputStream outputStream)
      Called when the specified BufferOutputStream has been asked to close itself.
      void handleWrite(BufferOutputStream outputStream)
      Called when the specified BufferOutputStream has buffered new bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • handleWrite

        void handleWrite(BufferOutputStream outputStream)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Called when the specified BufferOutputStream has buffered new bytes.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the BufferOutputStream to handle
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

          throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
